editorialSummary.text: Sleek high-rise lodging with a spa & a buzzy bistro, plus a chic rooftop bar with sweeping views.

originalText.text: Honestly the best decision to stay here and I’m a globalist so I have high hopes. Hotel was very clean, the market provided great coffees and breakfast, front desk staff was helpful and very kind. Our room was excellent with the suite upgrade. The star of our stay was Amy our Housekeeper. She deserves high recognition. She was very meticulous, took care of our bear family, provided amenities and fresh towels and really made us feel like home. The location near Times Square put us in the center of the action too! I’ll definitely be back again soon. Thank you team Hyatt Centric TS!!

I’ll definitely be back again soon. Thank you team Hyatt Centric TS!!

originalText.text:
Our stay at Hyatt Centric in Times Square was a fantastic experience overall. The hotel has everything you need, conveniently situated in the heart of Times Square. The rooms were clean, although on the smaller side, they didn't detract from the overall positive impression.

The staff provided great service, adding to the overall comfort of our stay. However, our excitement to try the rooftop bar on a Thursday night hit a snag. We headed up the elevator at 11:30, eager for a quick drink, only to find out they were already preparing for closing time at 12. Unfortunately, the elevator didn't allow us to reach the desired floor. A bit of a bummer, but it didn't overshadow the otherwise enjoyable stay at Hyatt Centric.

originalText.text:
We stayed at the Hyatt this past week for a few nights.  You can see the Times Square ball from the corner of the rooftop bar.  I felt it was much closer to Times Square then I through and it was perfect.

We had a King suite which was a large room with a seperate space with a pull out couch.  The bathroom was huge, updated and everything was so clean.  The employees were super nice and went out of their way to give the kids a rooftop tour.  We were pleasantly surprised and will be staying here next time we’re in town.  It was wonderful to have such great employees, a spacious, clean, updated room and so close to everything.  Thank you Hyatt!!

originalText.text:
The rooms were nice, but there was no refrigerator or microwave available.
Great Location, not able to see rooftop view, because you had to make a reservation.  We went out for dinner and drinks prior, so we were not thirsty or hungry.  Check in was slow and it wasn’t busy.  Otherwise, nice hotel.  Make a few improvements, and it would make for a more pleasant accommodating stay.

originalText.text: Stayed here last year and were completely happy with our stay. Room was clean and the staff was nice and helpful. Very close to all the Broadway theatres but in a quiet street so no noise disturbances at night.
